Topic.Title: Linking to local files with markdown (an accidental discovery)

Posts.EditableText:
Hello all!

This is pretty pointless, but I just accidentally discovered how to link to local files in markdown:

``` markdown

Look [back two directories, to the General Discussions page].

[back two directories, to the General Discussions page]:../../ 
```

Look [back two directories, to the General Discussions page].

[back two directories, to the General Discussions page]:../../ 

---

``` markdown

Check out the [Forum]!

[Forum]:../../../ "This title shows up on hover."
```

Check out the [Forum]!

[Forum]:../../../ "This title shows up on hover."

---

```
Check out the [Quest Forum]!

[Quest Forum]:../../../quest "This may or may not work."
```

Check out the [Quest Forum]!

[Quest Forum]:../../../quest "This may or may not work."

---
Very Squiffy-esque...
